description: Try our easy to follow Surf & Turf Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Surf & Turf Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 20 green king prawns, peeled, deveined, tails intact
1 long red chilli, deseeded, finely chopped
1 tbs vegetable oil (and 2 tsp vegetable oil for dressing)

recipeInstructions.text: For the dressing, combine ingredients in a screw-top jar and shake well to combine.
Heat 2 tsp oil in frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook steaks for 2-3 minutes each side. Set aside, covered with foil. Add remaining oil to pan. Cook prawns for 2 minutes each side.
Cut beef into thin strips. Arrange on plates with prawns, lettuce and herbs. Spoon over dressing. Sprinkle with spring onion.
